text: The men's quadruple sculls competition at the 2018 Asian Games in Palembang, Indonesia was held from 20 August to 24 August at the JSC Lake. == Schedule == All times are Western Indonesia Time (UTC+07:00) {|class = "wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! width=220|Date ! width=50|Time ! width=100|Event |- | Monday, 20 August 2018 || 10:00 || Heats |- | Wednesday, 22 August 2018 || 10:40 ||
